# Robots.txt for Jordan Customs System
# نظام إدارة تكاليف الشحن والجمارك الأردنية

# Allow all search engines
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /.env
Disallow: /config/

# Specific rules for Google
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 0

# Specific rules for Bing
User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

# Block bad bots
User-agent: MJ12bot
Disallow: /

User-agent: AhrefsBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: SemrushBot
Disallow: /

# Sitemap locations
Sitemap: https://jordan-customs-system.manus.space/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.mp3-app.com/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://mp3-app.com/sitemap.xml

# Cache settings
Request-rate: 1 request per 1 second
